medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began last evening with a crampy quality and has progressively become more severe. It is worst in the right lower quadrant, though it extends across the lower abdomen. Relief is experienced when lying still with the back slightly elevated. Sharp abdominal pain was noted during transport to the hospital due to bumps in the road.
medical_history.family_history: Father deceased from complications of lung and prostate cancer; Mother deceased from lung cancer; 7 brothers, 2 sisters.
